title: It's a second chance!
body:
{{champion:43}}  Hallelujah, PUH-RAAAAAISE JESUS!!!! 
I CAN POST AGAIN!

replies.body: Did you get banned from the boards or something?

> [{quoted}](name=Yamazaki Tetsuo,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=1KnsclEg,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-12-27T20:08:47.040+0000)
>
> Did you get banned from the boards or something?

From the old forums for trash talking the mods :^)
